GBM = Gilgit Buddhist Manuscripts (Facsimile Edition), ed. by Raghu Vira and Lokesh Chandra, 10 pts., New Delhi 1959Ō1974 (Sata-Pitaka Series 10). (The Vinayavastu manuscript is reproduced in vol. 2; the folios 43-53 of the Stein collection [Pravrajyāvastu/Poṣadhavastu] are not reproduced anymore)
